examples: We'd like as many people as possible to attend.
Nos gustaría que asistiera la mayor cantidad de personas posible.
The meeting was attended by 90% of shareholders.
A la reunión asistió el 90% de los accionistas.
asistir a una boda / funeral / servicio / ceremonia
Everyone is welcome to attend the free event.
Todos son bienvenidos a asistir al evento gratuito.
